content: So as it relates to the income caps in terms of where the industry has landed on these and where the bill is going with them, I believe the limits are for single earners , for household  in terms of income limits, which in terms of what's been communicated from administration officials and the industry actually applies to a large swath of folks across the U.S. We think there's a broad application for incentives across many different parts of the bill, in addition to the purchase of new EVs, like also increasing access for folks purchasing used EVs.
